mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.account_id AS "account.id", aa.name AS "account.name", aa.original_id AS "account.originalId", a.broker_id AS "broker.id", bb.nickname AS "broker.nickname", a.openid AS "openid", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_broker bb ON bb.id = a.broker_id LEFT JOIN wx_account aa ON aa.id = a.account_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_subscribes( id, account_id, broker_id, openid, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{account.id}, #{broker.id}, #{openid}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_subscribes SET account_id = #{account.id}, broker_id = #{broker.id}, openid = #{openid}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
